desc: Leading and professional LED fixtures supplier with 15 years experience in designing & production. Our products include LED Flush Mount Ceiling Light, LED Step Light, LED Track Light Head, LED Wall Sconces, LED Bath Vanity Lighting, etc.

layout.text: The RGB LED recessed light has more than 16 million colors, smooth 1%-100% dimming（Only support for APP control and Voice control）, 2700K-6500K color temperature etc.
